item.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Multiple Databases maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 17, 07:00 UTC  -  Nov 27, 07:00 UTC

Oct 15, 00:43 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our databases offer in cluster eu013.

This may temporarily affect availability.
Start time: 17/11/2025 07:00 UTC
End time: 27/11/2025 15:00 UTC
Service impact: The duration of the unavailability of each database will range from one to five minutes.
Service improvement: As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our databases offer.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Migration cluster006 to cluster106
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 30, 21:00 - 23:00 UTC

Sep 30, 14:57 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 30/10/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 30/10/2025 23:00 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance, cluster006 will be temporarily unavailable for 90 minutes.
Outgoing gateway IP will change during maintenance, please find the new one here :
https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-web-hosting-clusters-ip-addresses?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0052388
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a migration of cluster006 to cluster106.

Thank you for your understanding.
